sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"消失"之意。
means: vanish ： 语气强，指完全、往往是神秘而突然的消失，不留任何蛛丝马迹。
disappear ： 普通用词，强调从视线或脑海中消失。这消失可能是暂时的、突然的或永久的，视上下文而定。
evaporate ： 指像水蒸发时那样悄然逝去，也指某人悄悄地、突然退出或离去。

sentence.Network_en: She stood watching the car's tail-lights disappear down the drive.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站在那儿，望着小汽车的尾灯消失在车道尽头。

sentence.Network_en: He saw something dark disappear behind the curtain of leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看到一个黑漆漆的东西从浓密的树叶后消失了。

sentence.Network_en: It was uncharacteristic of her father to disappear like this.
sentence.Network_cn: 就这样消失不像她父亲的一贯作风。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Scope 范围 Disappear 消失 Appear 出现.
大英语B级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... disagree vi. 不一致 disappear vi. 消失, 不见 disappoint vt. 使失望.
字典中没字的解释 ... (4) 潜游水中[ dive] (6) 消失,不见;隐没[ disappear] (7) 覆灭;败亡[ destroy].
云字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 云雀〖 skylark〗 云散〖 disappear〗 云杉〖 dragonspruce〗.

list.abs: 十个科学无法解释的神秘现象（多图/录像） ... 3. 直觉（ Intuition） 4. 神秘消失（ Mysterious Disappearances） 5. 鬼魂（ Ghosts）.
求玛丽亚凯利的“Hero”中文歌词... ... And the emptiness you felt 你感觉到的空虚 Will disappear 将会消散 Lord knows 上帝知道.
人烟稀少 English, 翻译,... ... 烟霞 haze 烟消云散 to vanish like smoke in thin air;to disappear 烟熏 smoke;to fumigate.
石... ... 石子儿[ cobblestone] 石沉大海[ disappear forever;like a stone dropped into the sea that produce no reaction].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from dis- (expressing reversal) + appear, on the pattern of French disparaître

encyclopedia.content: 歌手：张惠妹 所属专辑：《Amit (Amit - Cmr)》 所属公司：百代唱片（EMI MUSIC）歌词 Once again, the same things on your mind Increasing pulse from what goes on inside Will you pay for what you've done (Hatred) Paybacks such a bitch, her vengeance haunts you So what's wrong tough guy, why the tears You drove me to this, now you disappear Now all those acts repaid Your turn to be afraid Not longer, al

entry.tran: (通常指因位置改变而)消失,不见
entry.def: If you say that someone or something disappears, you mean that you can no longer see them, usually because you or they have changed position.

example.ex: The black car drove away from them and disappeared...
example.tran: 那辆黑色轿车驶离了他们的视线。

example.ex: Clive disappeared into a room by himself...
example.tran: 克莱夫独自一人进了屋。

entry.def: If someone or something disappears, they go away or are taken away somewhere where nobody can find them.

example.ex: ...a Japanese woman who disappeared thirteen years ago...
example.tran: 一个 13 年前失踪的日本女人

example.ex: Janet's husband and sister noticed that small kitchen objects were disappearing with increasing regularity.
example.tran: 珍妮特的丈夫和她的姐姐发现厨房里的小物件经常不翼而飞，而且次数愈发频繁。

entry.def: If something disappears, it stops existing or happening.

example.ex: The immediate security threat has disappeared.
example.tran: 直接的安全威胁已不复存在了。

means.word_mean: 1. get lost, especially without warning or explanation;
4. become less intense and fade away gradually;

auth_sentence.content: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is no big loss when superfluous things disappear.

auth_sentence.content: In effect, he said, they simply disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content: In effect, he said, they simply disappear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In effect, he said, they simply disappear.

auth_sentence.content: To...disappear like the image on an improperly fixed photograph.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除
disappear消失+ance性质→n.不见, 消失 v.与……同等 n.同等的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现;出场;问世;仿佛;出版,发表
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+pear看见;出现→看见了→出现了
dis不+appear出现→不出现→消失
disappear消失+ance性质→n.不见, 消失 v.与……同等 n.同等的人
peer=pear看见;出现→凝视, 窥视→同等的人→与……同等

Sentence.sentence: Milkman, the sociologist, argues that American craftsmanship isn't disappearing as quickly as some would argue - that it has instead shifted to immigrants.
Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared.

sentences.en: A ship disappeared below the horizon.
The snow will soon disappear when the warm weather comes.
sentences.cn: 天气变暖时, 雪很快就会融化。

jushi.english: My dictionary disappeared off the table.
jushi.chinese: 我放在桌子上的词典不见了。

jushi.english: The car gathered speed and soon disappeared from view.
jushi.chinese: 那辆汽车加速,不一会儿就不见了。
